title: LOW PRIORITY QUEUE BULLCRAP!
body: so I disconnected in a game which is completely not my fault, my laptop decided to crash and it took a long while for me to reconnect ONCE I did reconnect it gave me a warning about afking and exit the game for me so I had to wait to reconnect AGAIN!! the thing is I actually reconnected and played the full match. I haven't left any other game but this ONE GAME, so why the hell do I have this low priority queue T-T it's so frustrating because I actually don't think I deserve it... lol ughhh riot seriously! get your shit together PLEASE and take this low priority bullcrap out of my name - thank you.

replies.body:
Hey Queenic,

It does take more than one AFK/Leave to be placed in a low priority queue.

That being said, I would suggest getting your laptop checked out if it just randomly decided to crash. There could be a bigger problem at hand, such as a software or hardware error.

I do feel sorry that you have been placed in the low priority queue due to a crashing laptop, but we are unable to remove you from this. Unfortunately if we were to do this, then it could potentially be abused by players forcefully shutting down their computers just to try and avoid a low priority queue because they want to AFK a game they believe they can't win.

From what I can see you don't have many games remaining in that queue, so it shouldn't be long and you will be back to normal.

Again I am sorry you have experienced this, and I really would suggest getting your laptop checked out.

-ToxicHawk
alright thank you for your response. yes I agree, I might be getting a new computer since I've had this macbook for too long. :( but aw stupid low priority queue lol
What's the specs of your laptop?
